abstract: After four rounds of of the government auction, only a single bid has emerged for the block of frequencies meant to combine national wireless voice and data service with communications for public safety agencies.
snippet: After four rounds of of the government auction, only a single bid has emerged for the block of frequencies meant to combine national wireless voice and data service with communications for public safety agencies.
lead_paragraph: The news from Friday’s two rounds of bidding in the 700-megahertz spectrum auction is that no one seems to be bidding for the D block of frequencies. These offer the right to operate a nationwide voice and data service that would also serve local public safety agencies.

headline.main: Spectrum Auction: Bidders Spurn Frequencies Linked to Public Safety
